1.title: Preserves, Pickles and Spreads

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: In the first heat four food producers with fledgling businesses test their products on the locals in Malhamdale in the Yorkshire Dales. The makers of preserves, pickles and spreads compete for a place in the final.

2.title: Cheese

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: In the second heat it is cheese-makers competing for a place in the final. Goat's cheeses, smoked cheese and cheddar cheese are among the products to be judged.

3.title: Sweets

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: This time it is sweet-makers competing in the third heat of the contest. Homemade chocolate bars, cocktail flavoured marshmallows, chocolate liquors and truffles and traditional Scottish tablet are judged.

4.title: Sauces

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: The fourth heat pits makers of cooking sauces against each other. Homemade hot sauce, salted caramel sauce, a healthier curry sauce and a unique 'paella in a bottle' are on show.

5.title: Meat

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: In this edition four meat producers fight it out for a place in the final. Home cured bacon flavoured with fennel, treacle and ale, venison bresaola, biltong and chicken liver parfait are the products to be judged.

6.title: Drinks

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: In the penultimate heat, four drinks producers compete for a place in the final. A cold brew coffee, an unusual cordial, a fermented tea and a baobab smoothie are tested.

7.title: Baked Goods

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: The final heat sees makers of baked goods compete. Phoebe makes free-from chocolate brownies. Bavarian-born Angelika makes pretzels. Mike makes traditional sourdough. Utako makes Japanese breads.

8.title: Final

episode of.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: All 7 heat winners compete in the grand final. First their produce will go on sale in the shop but without them there to promote it. They then return to the shop to host a farmers market.

imdb.title: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge
akas: Top of the Shop with Tom Kerridge (United Kingdom)
plot: Chef 'Tom Kerridge' (qv) hosts this competition in which fledgling artisan food producers must impress both the judges and the British public with their wares if they are to reach the final.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
